long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create original AI images from any page on the web

Introducing Imagifi from Easyfi.ai, your personal AI image generator! With Easyfi.ai Imagifi, you can effortlessly create visually engaging images for work or play.

⭐ The main features of Imagifi:

✔️ Create endless professional or creative images based on any web page, selected text or input
✔️ Choose the source, style, shape and quality. That's it - we automate the rest
✔️ Simply press 'Generate' to have a brilliant new piece of artwork in a few seconds
✔️ Save it, send it, or regenerate a new one
✔️ Start using for free

❌ No sign up or log in necessary
❌ No confusing prompts
❌ No strange chatbots
❌ No entering API keys
✔️ Enjoy improving your daily internet life

⭐ Usage guide:

➡️ Install the extension
➡️ Open the extension from the Chrome toolbar
➡️ Start creating AI imagery for free
➡️ If you're happy with the results, subscribe to Easyfi to use Imagifi and our other AI super tools to boost joy and productivity in your every day life

Our extension is constantly being improved 🚀. If you encounter any issues, please do not hesitate to contact us.
